name: The Unstable Gun
description:
THEME : UNSTABLE About

Weird squids have invaded the lab! It is up to you - wielder of the unstable gun to stop the menace! Collect the weapon nodes to unlock the full potential of your gun!

Controls

Click to shoot, WASD to move

version history

  • v.04 release
  • v.05 fix main menu bug, game over screen bug
